category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
I can only tell You what You already know:
I don't long for anything but You,
nothing but holiness,
nothing but being in sync with Your will.

You're the one who gave me these desires,
and only You can give me what I'm longing for.
My soul longs for a deep connection with You,
and to kill off the corruption inside me, especially my spiritual pride.

How precious it is to have a sensitive heart and a clear understanding
of what a truly godly and holy life is all about.
What an amazing blessing it is to be like You,
as much as it's possible for a created being to be like their Creator.

Lord, make me more like You.
Expand my soul to be able to hold more holiness.
Commit me to living more for You.
Help me to not get too satisfied with my spiritual experiences.
When I feel good after a sweet time with You,
teach me that I still have so much more to learn and do.

Blessed Lord,
let me climb up close to You,
and love You, and long for You, and plead, and even wrestle with You in prayer.
Let me be desperate for freedom from my sinful nature,
because my heart wanders and feels lifeless,
and my soul is sad to think
it could ever lose sight of You, the one it loves.

Wrap my life in Your divine love,
and keep me always wanting You,
always humble and surrendered to Your will,
more focused on You,
so I can be better equipped for whatever I have to do or whatever I have to endure.
